channel.title: Coursera on ZQ.Yu
channel.description: Recent content in Coursera on ZQ.Yu

item.title: Deep Learning Specialization Certificate
item.description: Recently I have completed the 5-month journey of the Deep Learning specialization on Coursera. I enjoyed this course a lot. Can’t wait to apply some of the idea in my research work. Cheers!

item.title: Deep Learning Course Certificates
item.description:
Good job for me to earn several deep learning related certificates under the Deep Learning Specialization on Coursera. The specialization is offered by Dr. Andrew Ng from deeplearning.ai.

The course assignments can be found at https://github.com/zhiqiyu/Deep-Learning-Coursera

Following is the breakdown course certificates I earned.

item.title: Applied Data Science with Python Coursera Certificates
item.description:
Good job for me to earn several certificates from the Applied Data Science with Python offered by Michigan University on Coursera!

The course material can be found at https://github.com/zhiqiyu/Applied-Data-Science-with-Python

item.title: Machine Learning Coursera Certificate
item.description:
Good job for me to earn the Machine Learning course certificate offered by Prof. Andrew Ng from Stanford University on Coursera!

The course assignments can be found at https://github.com/zhiqiyu/Machine-Learning-Coursera
